happy birthday dude!

Oldschool

and i thought up another ability for orcs: eat skeleton. i figure 
it'll be either an alternate to eat corpse or maybe its own ability. 
i personally rarely got eat corpse to work, so i don't know exactly 
what it would do, but it'd be a nice balancer to clerics, maybe.
